name: jhunt
text: There should be a shirt of that "lung brothers" image.  I'd buy it.

name: bsidestarchild
text: Or maybe just all with stitches running down the side.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: That would be righteous! I'd totally get matching shirts for my boyfriend and his best friend. I'v already got them matching "what we need more of is science" shirts.

name: hellofditties
text: How'd that go?

name: cousinted
text: There need to be two shirts, one with Ray marked "Lung" and one with Beef marked "Brothers".

name: jawsh
text:
matching shirts
one all with ray giving a high five
the other all with beef doing a similar motion
two people wear them next to eachother and do a side hug
it gives the appearance that the two are high fiving
an optical illusion

name: solobuttons
text: chubbied as HELL dogg holy shit

name: juancarlos
text: He just fell asleep, no anestesia. Ray should get the nobel prize on being amazing.

name: antsama
text: Ray figured it was just as easy as saying it and crawling into a nearby bed and falling asleep.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I wish I had a lung brother.

name: zapatos
text: Conjoined twins maybe?

name: craigola
text: I can fall asleep like that. It's never going to make me rich, but I consider it a blessing all the same.

name: never_die
text: i once had a lung brother.  we shared many a memorable hand slap.

name: nighttoad
text: once? did he take his lung back or something? sorry, but your lung brother sounds like kind of a jerk.

name: korukyu
text: Plus one chubby for you for that vivid mental image. "You slept with my girlfriend?! Fuck that, gimme back my damn lung you jackhole."

name: radchillies
text: Indian giving your organs is kind of a dick move.

name: mashuren
text: The complete lack of hesitation at the thought of giving up one of his lungs for Roast Beef makes me feel all warm and fuzzy. I wish I had a friend like that.

name: behka
text: i love how ray kind of wills himself into going under. t hey don't even have to give him any drugs, he just goes to sleep at will.

name: jugdish
text: i want to get the last frame tatooed on me

name: songbirdspectre
text: i want to get that last frame tatooed on my LUNG

name: bourbonsamurai
text:
Sweet lung tat, dude. Hurt like ten bitches on a bitch boat.

(I just made an ATHF reference on the Achewood forums. Is that okay? Am I still...rad?)

name: mattylite
text: Maybe it is or maybe it isn't rad, but it pales in comparison to the eminently chubbyable "sweet lung tat."

name: kamet
text: You are, indeed, still "rad".  You did not lose cool points because you like, appreciate, and can quote a cool show.  Chubby to you, sir.

name: combustache
text:
So my friend and I are gonna get the image in Ray's thought bubble tattooed on us.
The Ray half on one person's left lung area with "lung" above or below it.
The Beef half on the other person's right lung area with "buddies" or "brothers" above or below it.
The question is, "buddies" or "brothers?"
I'm thinkin' "brothers" since buddies is just the alt text.

name: juanclaudius
text:
Hey chris. I came to this comic to make this same damn post. fucking rad.
year it has to be brothers because nothin's more special than brothers 'specially for us dude without any. question is, which of us is ray and which of us is beef?

name: catgrl131
text: Dudes! How'd it go? Which one has which cat? POST PIXX PLZ!

name: juanclaudius
text: Didn't happen. The dude flaked on me about 6 months ago; we haven't spoken since. I am however getting a tattoo from the Magical Realism arc.

name: tekende
text: what the fuck is all this happy horseshit

name: charchar
text:
But from what we know of Ray's occasional use of heated-up marijuana Vs. Beef's clean-living, does Beef really want that lung?

Also, can people on life support truly experience the afterlife?

name: libelandslander
text: This is one of the strips that made me tear up a little. Right up there with Phillipe and Petunia.

name: mikeronomicon
text: When my Grandma was dieing of lung cancer I actually tried to get her to take one of my lungs. I warned her that the resin lining would make her high for what remained of her life and all she had to say is: "That would be one fucking hell of an improvement."

name: brokeaccount
text: I like to imagine that Ray sings "lung... brothers..." in a falsetto.
